data.title: Brand new luxury apartment of total 129 sq m for sale in Kato Glyfada
data.meta_description:
Brand new luxury apartment of total 129 sq m for sale in Kato Glyfada. In building 1974. It was renovated 2023. Apartment has beautiful garden view and located in nice central area.

The apartment offers Spacious living room with kitchen and very big balcony.
3 bedrooms (1 of them master) each room with balcony. Wooden floor .
2 bathroom , 1 WC
Laundry room.
One parking.

5 Airconditions.

The aluminum is brand new modern thin profile system.

High end faucets and mixers / designer kitchen/ all necessary new equipment installed (Refrigirator , dishwasher.. etc )
brand new electricity wiring and plumbing in the entire unit .
3 min to Metaxa by car.
data.text: IBPG provides a wide range of properties in Greece, from luxury villas to traditional houses. We are here to help you find the property of your dreams in Greece.
